医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
低收入和中等收入国家抗生素使用不当会破坏婴儿肠道健康，加剧抗菌素耐药性抗生素的过度使用会导致耐药细菌的问题。发展中国家和幼儿尤其受到影响。综述研究了抗生素如何影响低收入和中等收入国家婴儿的肠道细菌和耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Inproperty-antibiotic-use-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-disrupts-infant-gut-health-fuels-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Inproperty-antibiotic-use-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-disrupts-infant-gut-health-fuels-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d6062df-2248-4c7b-942d-4a80910ca708 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:33:00 -0400 Inappropriate antibiotic use in low and middle-income countries disrupts infant gut health, fuels antimicrobial resistance
不每晚刷牙可能会增加心血管疾病的风险研究调查了刷牙时间对心血管疾病风险的影响。研究发现，与根本不刷牙相比，晚上刷牙可以降低心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Skipping-nightly-toothbrushing-could-heighten-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Skipping-nightly-toothbrushing-could-heighten-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99de1254-0d06-4b8c-9dce-9702d8bf835a Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:23:00 -0400 Skipping nightly toothbrushing could heighten cardiovascular disease risk
太空如何影响宇航员的免疫系统？研究探讨了太空条件下微重力和辐射对免疫系统的影响。它强调需要了解这些对未来长期太空任务的影响，并强调进一步调查的知识差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/How-does-space-affect-the-immune-system-of-astronauts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/How-does-space-affect-the-immune-system-of-astronauts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a41f2e9-48ff-4201-bc75-595d16c7e3ff Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:05:00 -0400 How does space affect the immune system of astronauts?
英国的新冠死亡人数大幅下降，但痴呆症和心脏病仍然令人担忧新的政府数据显示上个月的死亡人数高于平均水平。痴呆症是英格兰最大的杀手，心脏病是威尔士的最大杀手。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Covid-deaths-plummet-in-England-but-dementia-and-heart-disease-remain-a-concern.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Covid-deaths-plummet-in-England-but-dementia-and-heart-disease-remain-a-concern.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7fbac37-5632-4b05-bd21-6d65924d1ba8 Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:49:00 -0400 Covid deaths plummet in England, but dementia and heart disease remain a concern
使用人工智能程序确定治疗流感的多个药物靶点Poolbeg Pharma 是一家临床阶段的生物制药公司，专注于医疗需求未得到满足的传染病和其他流行病，宣布与 CytoReason 合作的世界首个流感人工智能 (“AI”) 项目取得重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Multiple-drug-targets-for-the-treatment-of-influenza-identified-using-AI-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Multiple-drug-targets-for-the-treatment-of-influenza-identified-using-AI-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f0627f6-8f3c-4f17-b452-08f4639c651b Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:46:00 -0400 Multiple drug targets for the treatment of influenza identified using AI program
OVUM 强调人工智能在 IVF 革命中的潜力生殖和生育健康品牌 OVUM 强调了人工智能 (AI) 在彻底改变体外受精 (IVF) 领域的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/OVUM-highlights-the-pottial-of-AI-in-revolutionizing-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/OVUM-highlights-the-pottial-of-AI-in-revolutionizing-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85b9b1b4-983b-4ad4-b08e-185448ec8a4d Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:43:00 -0400 OVUM highlights the potential of AI in revolutionizing IVF
科学家可以通过 Aivia 12 利用人工智能的力量来研究神经元形态显微镜和科学仪器领域的领导者徕卡显微系统公司发布了其旗舰人工智能图像分析软件 Aivia 第 12 版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Scientists-can-study-neuronal-morphology-by-harnessing-the-power-of-AI-with-Aivia-12.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Scientists-can-study-neuronal-morphology-by-harnessing-the-power-of-AI-with-Aivia-12.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a1ed48e-7c8d-4330-9e76-3b58ad174b0b Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:33:00 -0400 Scientists can study neuronal morphology by harnessing the power of AI with Aivia 12
斯密特心脏研究所的患者在成功进行机器人手术后计划攀登秘鲁的马丘比丘山顶是个好地方https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Smidt-Heart-Institute- Patient-plans-to-climb-Perus-Machu-Picchu-after-successful-robotic-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Smidt-Heart-Institute- Patient-plans-to-climb-Perus-Machu-Picchu-after-successful-robotic-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3de9d82-06b5-4be4-a660-fba1cb5b2f8a Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:27:00 -0400 Smidt Heart Institute patient plans to climb Peru's Machu Picchu after successful robotic surgery
西班牙研究人员开发出治疗肝癌的新免疫疗法组合西班牙纳瓦拉西玛大学的研究人员开发了一种新的免疫疗法组合，可以提高肝细胞癌动物模型的疗效。这是一个概念验证，为将该疗法应用于最常见的肝癌患者奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Spanish-researchers-develop-new-immunotherapy-combination-for-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Spanish-researchers-develop-new-immunotherapy-combination-for-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6377724-f638-4ce7-9a37-c9f61eaf29eb Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:20:00 -0400 Spanish researchers develop new immunotherapy combination for liver cancer
蜱虫可以被静电吸引到宿主身上布里斯托大学的研究人员发现，蜱虫可以被宿主自然积累的静电吸引到比自身大几倍的气隙中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f691e750-f844-4307-9987-7d6506494066 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 22:59:56 -0400
